title: Suitcase Of Love And Shame - Snap Classic
description: In 2009, Jane Gillooly came across an item on Ebay that piqued her imagination.  The picture was of a suitcase filled with old audiotapes. The listing’s title was “Suitcase of Love and Shame.”
itunes:title: Suitcase Of Love And Shame - Snap Classic
